description: Use: Inflicts 37 to 51 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 21 to 28 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 3 yard radius for 1 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 24. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use:  Teaches you how to summon this companion.
Use: Inflicts 75 to 103 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Drops a target dummy on the ground that attracts nearby monsters to attack it.  Lasts for 15 seconds or until killed. (2 Min Cooldown)
A Small Seaforium charge which is enough to blast open some doors.
Use: Blasts open simple locked doors and chests.
Use: Restores 180 mana over 18 sec.  Must remain seated while drinking.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Use: Inflicts 42 to 57 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 5 yard radius for 1 sec.  Any damage will break the effect. Unreliable against targets higher than level 36. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 72 to 97 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 3 yard radius for 2 sec.  Any damage will break the effect. Unreliable against targets higher than level 39. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Absorbs 500 fire damage.  Lasts 1 min. (15 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 127 to 172 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 84 to 115 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 5 yard radius for 2 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 44. (1 Min Cooldown)

Use: Restores 149 to 250 health and mana to a friendly target and attempts to dispel any polymorph effects from them.  Reduced effectiveness against polymorph effects from casters of level 31 and higher. (5 Min Cooldown)
Use: Absorbs 600 Frost damage.  Lasts 1 min. (15 Min Cooldown)
Use: When applied to a melee weapon it gives a 10% chance of casting Frostbolt at the opponent when it hits.  Lasts 30 minutes. Cannot be applied to items higher than level 165.
Use: Transforms the target into a Leper Gnome, reducing its melee damage and spell power by 40 and its movement rate by 20% for 12 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 84 to 115 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 5 yard radius for 2 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 44. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 131 to 218 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 3 sec in a 3 yard radius.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 50. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Creates a Compact Harvest Reaper that will fight for you for 10 min or until it is destroyed. (10 Min Cooldown)
Use: Drops a target dummy on the ground that attracts nearby monsters to attack it. Lasts for 15 seconds or until killed. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 148 to 201 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 5 yard radius for 3 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 53. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Gives invisibility for 10 sec. (1 Hour Cooldown)
Use: Blasts open difficult locked doors and chests.
Use: Restores 180 mana over 18 sec.  Must remain seated while drinking.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
An improved scope that increases the damage done with your bow or gun.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Allows you to look far into the distance.
Use: Causes all Beasts in a 5 yard radius to run away for 10 sec.  Chance of failure when used against targets over level 60. (1 Min Cooldown)
A classic test of skill, the clockwork box provides the same skill gain potential when disassembled.
Use: Disassemble the clockwork box to improve your skill in Engineering, up to a maximum of 125.
Use: The dynamite for Non-Engineers that nearly always gets to the target!  Inflicts 50 to 69 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: These dangerous looking boots significantly increase your run speed for 20 sec.  They are prone to explode however, so use with caution. (5 Min Cooldown)
"Used by Goblin Engineers to power their creations"
Use: Allows control of a mechanical target for a short time.  It may not always work and may just root the machine or make it very very angry.  Gnomish engineering at its finest. (3 Min Cooldown)
Use: When applied to your fishing pole, increases Fishing by 100 for 10 minutes.
Use: When applied to your fishing pole, increases Fishing by 50 for 10 min.
Use: Jumper Cables will sometimes be able to shock a dead ally back to life.  Cannot be used when in combat. (30 Min Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 212 to 287 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Inflicts 148 to 201 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 8 yard radius for 2 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 60. (1 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Moderately increases your stealth detection.
Use: Slightly increases your stealth detection for 10 min.  Guardian Elixir.
Use: Reduces your fall speed for 10 sec. (30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 254 to 345 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 3 yard radius for 3 sec.  Any damage will break the effect. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use:  Teaches you how to make Goblin Rocket Fuel.
Use: Inflicts 382 to 517 Fire damage and stuns the targets in a 5 yard radius for 3 sec. (10 Min Cooldown)
Use: Absorbs 299 to 500 Fire damage.  Lasts 1 min. (1 Hour Cooldown)
Use: Inflicts 339 to 460 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 5 sec in a 10 yard radius.  Any damage will break the effect.  Unreliable against targets higher than level 60. (1 Min Cooldown)
"Used by Goblin Engineers to power their creations"
Use: Inflicts 212 to 287 Fire damage in a 5 yard radius. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Creates a mobile bomb that charges the nearest enemy and explodes for 314 to 385 fire damage. (30 Min Cooldown)
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 0.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.

Use: Charge an enemy, knocking it silly for 30 seconds. Also knocks you down, stunning you for a short period of time. Any damage caused will revive the target.  Chance to fizzle when used against targets over level 60. (20 Min Cooldown)
Use: Absorbs 299 to 500 Fire damage.  Lasts 1 min. (1 Hour Cooldown)
"Used by Goblin Engineers to power their creations"
Use: The device charges over time using your life force and then directs a burst of energy at your opponent. (5 Min Cooldown)
"Death or Serious Injury may result from use of this device."
"Used by Gnomish Engineers to reinforce their creations"
Use: Explodes when triggered dealing 449 to 750 Fire damage to all enemies nearby and 374 to 625 damage to you. (5 Min Cooldown)
Use:  Teaches you how to make an Inlaid Mithril Cylinder.  This item is used by Gnomish Engineers.
Use: Shrinks the target reducing their attack power by 250.  That's what it usually does anyway..... (5 Min Cooldown)
Use: Summons an Explosive Sheep which will charge at a nearby enemy and explode for 134 to 165 damage.  Lasts for 3 min or until it explodes. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Captures the target in a net for 20 sec.  The net has a lot of hooks however and sometimes gets caught in the user's clothing when fired...... (10 Min Cooldown)

Use: A shield of force protects you from the next 500 damage done over the next 10 min. WARNING:  Force Field may overload when struck temporarily removing the wearer from this dimension. (1 Hour Cooldown)
Use: These boots significantly increase your run speed for 20 sec.  WARNING:  Their power supply and gyros do not always function as intended. (15 Min Cooldown)
Use: Creates a Battle Chicken that will fight for you for 1 min or until it is destroyed. (20 Min Cooldown)
"Used by Gnomish Engineers to reinforce their creations"

Use: Engage in mental combat with a humanoid target to try and control their mind.  If all works well, you will control the mind of the target for 30 sec ..... Increased chance of failure when used against targets over level 60. (30 Min Cooldown)
Use: Deals 60 to 69 fire damage for 10 sec to all targets in a cone in front of the engineer using the weapon.   That is unless it explodes..... (5 Min Cooldown)
"Used by Goblin Engineers to power their creations"

Equip: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the wearer by 10%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.
Use: Drains 674 to 1125 mana from those in the blast radius and does 50% of the mana drained in damage to the target.  Also Silences targets in the blast for 5 sec.
Increased chance of failure if you are higher than level 60. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Allows an experienced engineer to turn water into a snowball.  The Snowmaster requires a day to build up enough chill to freeze another snowball. (1 Day Cooldown)
Use: When applied to a melee weapon it gives a 10% chance of casting Frostbolt at the opponent when it hits.  Lasts 30 minutes. Cannot be applied to items higher than level 165.
Use: Unfolds into a Field Repair Bot that can repair damaged items and purchase unwanted goods.  After 10 minutes its internal motor fails. (10 Min Cooldown)

Permanently attaches a high-powered device to your belt, allowing you to confuse nearby mechanicals.  Only a skilled engineer can activate the modified belt.
Can only be attached to your own belt, and doing so causes the belt to become soulbound.
Attach a miniaturized explosive assembly to your belt, allowing you to detach and throw a thermal grenade every minute.
The thermal grenade inflicts 750 to 1000 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 3 sec in a 3 yard radius.

Permanently attaches a hand-mounted pyro rocket launcher to your gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to deal 1050 to 1280 Fire damage to an enemy at long range.  The rocket can only be fired once every 45 sec.
Can only be used on the engineer's gloves, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.
Permanently attaches hyperspeed accelerators to a pair of gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to increase their haste by 240 for 12 sec.  The gloves can only be activated every minute.
Permanently attaches a flexweave underlay to a cloak, allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute and fall slowly for 30 sec.
The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires an Engineering skill of at least 350.
Permanently attaches overpowered nitro boosts to your belt, allowing you to greatly increase run speed for 5 sec.  They rarely explode violently, so don't worry about that.
The nitro boosts can only be activated every 3 minutes and require an Engineering skill of at least 400.
Use: Creates a mechanical Scrapbot that repairs equipment and buys nearly anything.  The scrapbot leaves after 5 min. (15 Min Cooldown)
"Used as a mining pick or blacksmith hammer."
Use: Inflicts 750 to 1000 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 3 sec in a 3 yard radius.  Any damage will break the effect. (1 Min Cooldown)
"Used as a mining pick or skinning knife."
Use: An engineer with at least 350 skill can overload the knife's battery and attempt to shock a dead ally back to life.  Cannot be used in combat. (30 Min Cooldown)
"Includes Gyromatic Micro-Adjustor, Arclight Spanner, Nose Picker, Blacksmithing Hammer, Back Scratcher, and Whirly Thing."
Pickup: +10 Skinning; does not need to be equipped.
Pickup: +10 Mining; does not need to be equipped.
Use: Summons a decoy that explodes when attacked, shredding enemies for 1439 to 2160 Physical damage.  Lasts for 3 min or until it explodes. (2 Min Cooldown)
"Warning Label: May explode prematurely if subjected to an electromagnetic pulse."
Use: Turn 10 crystallized earth into an eternal earth.
Equip: Protected from the cold.  Your Frost resistance is increased by 20.
Use: Turn an eternal shadow into 10 crystallized shadow.
Equip: The noise made from melee combat sometimes causes Sonic Awareness, increasing your attack power by 430 for 10 sec.  This effect can only occur once every minute.
Equip: Melee attacks against you have a chance to invoke a Sonic Shield, absorbing 1100 damage.  This effect can only occur once a minute.
Use: Generates a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy for 1529 to 1870 Nature damage.  This entire device is made of metal.... (1 Min Cooldown)

Permanently inserts reticulated armor webbing into gloves, allowing you to increase armor by 700 for 14 sec.  Can be used once every minute.
Attaching the armor webbing causes the gloves to become soulbound.  An Engineering skill of 400 is required to keep the webbing active.
Use: Restores 7200 health over 6 sec to a friendly siege vehicle or mechanical unit. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Turn 10 crystallized fire into an eternal fire.
Use: Turn 10 crystallized water into an eternal water.
Attaches a tiny mind amplification dish to your belt, allowing you to engage in mental battle with your enemies to hopefully control them.  Can be used every 10 min.
Use: Creates an unstable wormhole the Engineer can use to travel around Northrend.  Lasts 1 min. (4 Hour Cooldown)
"Dimensional folding is not fully understood in any capacity.  A parachute and medical supplies are best kept on hand!"
Use: Turn an eternal shadow into 10 crystallized shadow.
Use: Turn an eternal water into 10 crystallized water.
Use: Turn an eternal fire into 10 crystallized fire.

Use: Creates a mechanical Scrapbot that repairs equipment and buys nearly anything.  The scrapbot leaves after 5 min. (15 Min Cooldown)
Permanently attaches synapse springs to your gloves, allowing you to increase your highest primary statistic by 1920 for 10 sec.  The gloves can be activated every minute.
Permanently attaches quickflip deflection plates onto gloves, allowing you to increase your armor by 1500 for 12 sec.  Gloves can only be activated once every minute.
Attaching the quickflip plates causes the gloves to become soulbound.  An Engineering skill of 450 is required to activate the plates.
Permanently attaches a tazik shocker to your gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to deal 4320 to 5280 Nature damage to an enemy at long range.  The shocker can only be used once every 2 min.
Permanently attaches a specialized injector kit to your belt, allowing you to heal yourself for 26999 to 33000 every minute.  Shares a cooldown with potions.
Fires several charged bolts at an enemy for 79 to 120 damage and briefly interrupts casting.  Consumes a Handful of Obsidium Bolts each time it's fired.
Equip: Makes you appear more gifted and attractive.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases ranged hit by 0.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Blasts open locked doors and chests that require lockpicking skill of 400 and below.
Use: Removes the safety mechanism from a bow or gun, increasing its ranged haste by 0.
Using this kit causes the bow or gun to become soulbound.
Use: Fires several charged bolts at an enemy for 79 to 120 damage and briefly interrupts casting.  Consumes a Handful of Obsidium Bolts each time it's fired. (2 Min Cooldown)
"Nearly as complicated to operate as it is to make."
Use:  Teaches you how to summon this companion.
Use:  Teaches you how to summon this companion.
"Possibly the finest toolbox ever made, embellished with gold inlay."
Use: Retrieves the loot from a nearby corpse.
Permanently attaches thousands of tiny mirrors to your belt, allowing you to attempt to turn invisible while out of combat.  Can be activated once every 3 min.
Permanently attaches grounded plasma generators to your belt, allowing you to activate a powerful shield that absorbs 16200 to 19800 damage.  Usable once every 5 minutes.
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that sometimes increases ranged attack power by 800 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Set out the barbecue to feed your entire raid or party!
Restores 67500 health and 45000 mana over 30 sec.  If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 60 Stamina and 60 in another useful stat for 1 hour.

Use: Restores 67500 health and 45000 mana over 30 sec.  Must remain seated while eating.  If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 60 expertise and 60 Stamina for 1 hour.
Use: When applied to your fishing pole, increases Fishing by 150 for 15 minutes.
Pickup: Allows a skilled engineer to occasionally collect Volatile Air while mining, skinning, or collecting herbs.
Use: Attaches a permanent device to a bow or gun that sometimes launches a rabid critter, dealing additional damage to the target and increasing your Agility by 300 for 10 sec.
Attaching this device to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
"'slike a wee angry bullet wit' teeth, son."
Permanently attaches lightweight transfluxers onto gloves, allowing you to partially phase and increase dodge by 0 for 10 sec.  Gloves can only be activated once every minute.
Attaching phase fingers causes the gloves to become soulbound.  An Engineering skill of 500 is required to activate the phase effect.

Permanently attaches a mounted fireworks launcher to your gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to deal 42000 to 63000 Fire damage over 3 sec to an enemy at long range.  The launcher can only be fired once every 45 sec.
Can only be used on the engineer's gloves, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.
Permanently attaches waterjets to your belt, allowing you to walk on water and swim quickly for 12 sec.
The jets can only be activated every 30 sec and require 500 Engineering skill to use.

Permanently attaches a specialized folding assembly to a cloak, allowing you to deploy a goblin glider and fall slowly for 30 sec.  The glider has some initial thrust and allows you to turn while falling.
The cloak can only be used once every five minutes and requires an Engineering skill of at least 500 to operate.
Ghost iron can be shaved into tiny particles, giving it the ability to detonate explosively.
Use: Permanently attaches Lord Blastington's special scope to a ranged weapon, sometimes increasing Agility by 1800 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Permanently attaches a mirrored scope to a ranged weapon, sometimes increases critical strike by 900 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks.
Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Use: Blasts open locked doors and chests that require lockpicking skill of 450 and below.
Use: Inflicts 1 Fire damage to an enemy up to 45 yards away, as well as any enemies within 10 yards of the primary target. (1 Min Cooldown)
Use: Unleash a gout of lightning, dealing 1 Nature damage to targets in a 10 yard cone in front of the caster every 0.5 sec for 4 sec.

Use: Teleports you to somewhere in Pandaria.  The exact location is difficult to predict, but will likely be far away. (15 Min Cooldown)
